metadata.description: Claude Code utility plugins for Python development, architecture, auditing, and documentation workflows

plugins.name: python-dev
plugins.description: Python implementation, testing, and code review skills

plugins.name: commit-helper
plugins.description: Generate conventional commit messages with GPG signing and approval workflow

plugins.name: codebase-tools
plugins.description: Codebase research and context compaction skills with ACE-FCA rules

plugins.name: backend-design
plugins.description: Backend system architecture and API design skills

plugins.name: mas-design
plugins.description: Multi-agent system plugin design and OWASP MAESTRO security framework

plugins.name: website-audit
plugins.description: Website design research, usability audit, and WCAG accessibility audit skills

plugins.name: docs-generator
plugins.description: Academic writeup generation, PRD-to-JSON conversion, and interactive user story builder

plugins.name: workspace-settings-sandbox

plugins.description: Distributes recommended workspace settings (statusLine, attribution, enabled plugins)
